creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: central painted image of standing nude man seen in 3/4 view from back, with PL leg in front of PR leg and head down; sketchy images of portions of similarly posed figures at left in red and at right in black and flesh tones, with primarily grey, red, and yellow diagonal lines at left; vertical printed cloth strip of repeating photographic images of man in same pose as central figure in painting along left edge of painting; vertical printed cloth strip of repeating photographic images of two alternating Classical freizes with figures along right edge of painting; black and white printed fabric borders with square and chevron motifs; yellow, black, brown, orange, and metallic gold trim around edges of central painting and photographic strips; orange strip at center bottom printed, "THANK YOU JESUS FOR PAUL ROBESON"; black cursive printing to right of orange strip: "and for Nicholas Murray's photograph - 1926"
medium: Acrylic on canvas with African fabric borders and photo transfer
signed: LRC in red and white: Amos / 1995 | at bottom center and right printed in black: THANK YOU JESUS FOR PAUL ROBESON and for Nicholas Murray\'s photograph - 1926
title: Thank You Jesus for Paul Robeson (and for Nicholas Murray's Photograph - 1926)
